囊中取物.definition: as easy as reaching for it from a bag (idiom); in the bag; (as good as) in one's possession

囊中羞澀.definition: to be embarrassingly short of money

囊括.definition: to include; to embrace; to bring together

囊揣.definition: soft, fat meat of pig's belly; sow's sagging teats; weakling; flabby person; also written 囊膪

囊膪.definition: soft, fat meat of pig's belly; sow's sagging teats; weakling; flabby person; also written 囊揣

囊謙.definition: Nangqên County (Tibetan: nang chen rdzong) in Yushu Tibetan Autonomous Prefecture 玉樹藏族自治州|玉树藏族自治州[Yu4 shu4 Zang4 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Qinghai

囊謙縣.definition: Nangqên County (Tibetan: nang chen rdzong) in Yushu Tibetan Autonomous Prefecture 玉樹藏族自治州|玉树藏族自治州[Yu4 shu4 Zang4 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Qinghai
